article.title: Bell-Boeing to Upgrade CV-22
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Bell-Boeing Joint Project Office, Amarillo, Texas, is being awarded a $7,049,944 firm-fixed-price delivery order against a previously issued basic ordering agreement for the Block 20/C upgrade to the CV-22 to include co-site communications; multi-mission advanced tactical terminal replacement; standby flight instrument; Global Positioning System repeater system; parking brake light; and environmental control system upgrades.Â The Naval Air Systems Command, Patuxent River, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
